hints.hint: The login form doesn't properly validate user input before using it in database queries. Have you tried entering special characters like quotes (') in the username field?

SQL injection works by breaking out of the intended query structure. Try using SQL logical operators (OR) and comments (--) to manipulate the authentication check. The admin user exists in the database!
Use this payload in the username field: admin' OR '1'='1' -- (with any password). This will bypass the authentication by making the WHERE clause always true and commenting out the password check.
